description: This PHP source file generates a web interface page for managing NAT (Network Address Translation) port mappings, including displaying existing mappings, adding new ones, enabling/disabling, and deleting entries. It includes server-side PHP code for data retrieval and client-side JavaScript for user interactions.

methods.name: ondelete
methods.description: Handles deletion of NAT mapping entries via AJAX call.

methods.name: onenable
methods.description: Enables or disables a NAT mapping entry via AJAX call.

methods.name: ondisableAll
methods.description: Enables or disables all NAT mappings via AJAX call.

methods.name: initEvents
methods.description: Initializes event handlers for NAT management UI interactions.

methods.name: onchangeNatDisable
methods.description: Enables or disables NAT UI controls based on the disable state.

methods.name: initNatFields
methods.description: Sets up initial state of NAT related UI controls.
